verse: So this is what the Lord ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts] says:

What person is wise enough to understand these things? Is there someone who has been ·taught [spoken to] by the Lord who can explain them [Hos. 14:9]? Why was the land ·ruined [scorched]? Why has it been made like an empty desert where no one goes?

The Lord answered, “It is because Judah ·quit following [abandoned; forsook] my ·teachings [laws; instructions] that I gave them. They have not ·obeyed me [listened to my voice] or ·done what I told them to do [walked in it].
Instead, they ·were stubborn [walked after their stubborn hearts] and ·followed [walked after] the Baals, as their ·ancestors [fathers] taught them to do.”

So this is what the Lord ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts], the God of Israel, says: “I will soon make the people of Judah eat ·bitter food [wormwood; the bitter tasting leaves of a shrub] and drink poisoned water.

I will scatter them through other nations that they and their ·ancestors [fathers] never knew about. I will ·chase [pursue; send after] them [the people of Judah] with the sword until they are all ·killed [consumed; finished].”
This is what the Lord ·All-Powerful [Almighty; of Heaven’s Armies; of hosts] says:

The Lord says, “The ·time is [days are] coming when I will punish all those who are circumcised only in the ·flesh [foreskin; observing external rituals (Gen. 17:9–14), but not from the heart; 4:4; 6:10]:

the people of Egypt, Judah, Edom, ·Ammon [the sons of Ammon], Moab, and the ·desert [wilderness] people who ·cut their hair short [shave their temples; Deut. 14:1]. ·The men in all those countries [All these nations] are not circumcised. And the ·whole family [house] of Israel ·does not give itself to serving me [is uncircumcised in/of heart].”
